header.title: Hi, I'm Pedro Vitor
header.subtitle: Full-stack developer
header.description: I'm a full stack developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites. I have a strong background in web development and I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow and improve my skills.

project_1.title: Ultranimes
project_1.description: During my experience at BuuhVProjects, I developed the website and application to promote Ultranimes, an events app. I created the frontend and participated in the backend development, ensuring robust functionalities and attractive interfaces. The successful launch reflected months of hard work and passion for software development, generating a positive response from users. I take valuable learnings to future challenges.

project_2.title: Solar System - Freelancer
project_2.description: This was my first website working as a freelance developer. The client wanted a website to promote the solar energy company, Solar System.
